title.narrative: Programa de Agua para Pequeñas Comunidades

description.narrative: Increase the coverage of services for potable water supply and safe disposal of wastewater increased for rural communities in a way that ensures their sustainability.
Incrementar la cobertura de servicios de agua potable y disposición de aguas residuales en comunidades rurales en una manera que asegure su sostenibilidad.
